entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
